document.full_text: an off-center drilling pipe in bp's doomed macondo well disabled a blowout-preventer and prevented the fail-safe device from operating, a technical expert told a u.s. government panel on monday.
document.title: u.s. oil-spill panel focuses on blowout preventer
lines_and_colors: an off-center drilling pipe in bp's doomed macondo well disabled a blowout-preventer and prevented the fail-safe device from operating, a technical expert told a u.s. government panel on monday.
